import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import "../Styles/SurveyForm.css"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import surveyStore from "../Mobx/SurveyStore"; const SurveyForm: React.FC = () => { const [send, setSend] = useState({}); const [show, Setshow] = useState(false); const [data, Setdata] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { await surveyStore.GetQuestion(); Setdata(surveyStore.Questions); } fetchData(); }, []); return (

Customer Satisfaction Survey

{data[0].Question_En}

{data[1].Question_En}

{data[2].Question_En}

How satisfied are you with quality and the prices of our product?

{show === true ? (
Mobile
) : ( <> )}
); }; export default SurveyForm;
